title: Oh. My. Gods.
description: LA Teen narrator Phoebe has one year to plan for running scholarship to college, until Mom marries Damian, principal of Academy for descendants of Greek gods. Stepsister Stella asks her to break up Griffin and Adara, but new friends Nicola and Troy warn of trouble. Griffin keeps ancestor Hercules secret, because hero aspect forces him to help those weaker.
author: Tera Lynn Childs
